successes.title: Shadows Over Normandie
successes.description: When Heroes of Normandie & Achtung! Cthulhu meet for a boardgame, it gives you Shadows over Normandie, a new epic tale of World War 2.

Pledges.description:
Deep Ones Pledge. I want to help Axel to get a job and have access to the additional purchases.
This pledge doesn't give you access to the Stretch goals. See "Shipping" at the end of the Shadows over Normandie kickstarter Page
je veux aider Axel à avoir son boulot et pouvoir avoir accès aux produits de la boutique.
Ce pledge ne donne pas accès aux stretch goals. Voyez  "Shipping"  à la fin de la page Kickstarter de Shadows over Normandie.

Dagon Pledge.
I already ordered Shadows over Normandie core box during the last KS or i don't want to ear about it.
The lighthouse/Pointe du Hoc adventure set. This pledge gives you access to all Stretch goals.
See "Shipping" at the end of the Shadows over Normandie kickstarter Page.

Cthulhu pledge I want Shadows over Normandie core box and The lighthouse/Pointe du Hoc adventure set. This pledge gives you access to all Stretch goals. See "Shipping" at the end of the Shadows over Normandie kickstarter Page.

Cthulhu pledge
I want Shadows over Normandie core box and
The lighthouse/Pointe du Hoc adventure set.
This pledge gives you access to all Stretch goals.
See "Shipping" at the end of the Shadows over Normandie kickstarter Page.

This pledge is for stores only.
Shadow Lodge.
You get 5 copies of Shadows Over Normandie stand alone box.
Plus 5 copies of each unlocked stretch goals up to 200K
1 copy of each unlocked Kick Starter Exclusive up to 200K
Become a member of the Shadow Society
P&P France 20€, EEC and RoW to be confirmed.

This pledge is for stores only.
Shadow League.
You get 10 copies of Shadows Over Normandie stand alone box.
Plus 10 copies of each unlocked stretch goals up to 200K
1 copy of each unlocked Kick Starter Exclusive up to 200K
Become a member of the Shadow Society
P&P France free, EEC and RoW to be confirmed.
This pledge is for Chagall Chen only.
